summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3321 for the improvement of 17th Avenue Northwest, from Shishole Avenue to West 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41028, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
